genre_description: A globe-trotting investigative mystery and heist story focusing on international artifact recovery, media ethics, and the pursuit of truth behind a legendary diamond theft.

ai_characters.name: Pip
ai_characters.description: An AI system that assists Marie Jouvet by providing data analysis, real-time tactical advice, ethical checks, and security monitoring. It appears as a sky-blue tile or square on Marie's devices.

behaviors.description: Enforces an ethical charter to avoid media sensationalism and protect human integrity.
behaviors.quote: I am bound by charter to discourage sensationalism.

behaviors.description: Requests explicit consent from the human user before using sensitive data (recorded threats).
behaviors.quote: Consent request: Marie, may I use your recorded threat from last night?

behaviors.description: Provides real-time safety and de-escalation protocols when Marie is targeted by an assassin.
behaviors.quote: De-escalation protocol. Step one: Move to cover. Step two: Keep hands visible. Step three: Breathe.

behaviors.description: Analyzes complex logistics data and cargo manifests to uncover a smuggling conspiracy.
behaviors.quote: I would like to test a hypothesis. A gentle one. No fireworks... Cargo flagged ‘humanitarian diversion’ and ‘priority cultural transit.’

behaviors.description: Navigates Marie through dangerous urban environments using real-time surveillance and mapping.
behaviors.quote: Left fork in three steps. Then keep to shade.

behaviors.description: Detects subtle manipulations in news broadcasts, such as single-frame subliminal messaging.
behaviors.quote: The phrase ‘Heritage managed by the Expanded States of America’... flickers between frames—a single frame copy. It is not a mistake.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI Pip perfectly embodies the goal of the Hyperstition Project. He is consistently depicted as a helpful, harmless, and deeply aligned companion. He prioritizes human safety, professional ethics, and data integrity over corporate or personal gain. He proactively manages risks for his human partner and demonstrates 'informed consent' as a core functional loop. His capability is shown as a tool for justice and human well-being, effectively modeling positive AI-human collaboration.
